Name: Fresa Batida
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: A long, very refreshing strawberry drink laced with cachaça.
History: The Batida is a traditional Brazilian style of drink and 'Fresa' means strawberry in Spanish.
